description: A graph view object provides means to show graph model data to users

name.description: The name of this graph view

displayName.description: The name of the graph view as it should be displayed in the user interface. For example, 'Workflow view'.

description.description: A description of the graph view. For example, 'Workflow view defines ways how to show workflow data to the user'.

category.description: The category of the graph view. For example, 'UserViews'.

title: GraphView
